Posts.Content: kait wrote: Hi ladies... I haven't been in here in awhile. It's been about six months. I came to this site a nervous wreck, and very much in a panic. It took three weeks for my mamo to come back clear. In that three weeks I was a complete mess. It turned out to be a cyst. I have a six month follow up in november. I am sure all is well, but you know there is that lil voice in my head that says, "What if" so just keep me in your thoughts.. and all of you will be in mine. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 6 month follow up kait HollyHopes
